languages.text: You can press {console_bind|Confirm} to highlight abilities and consumables on the panel at the bottom of the screen or choices in dialogues and book events to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or objects on the map, use {console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text: In dialogues, book events, and on the ability bar, you can signal other players by using {console_bind|Confirm}. For other objects, such as enemies, NPCs, planets, and more, use {console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm}.

You can press {console_bind|Confirm} to highlight text lines in dialogues and book events or abilities on the abilities panel to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or planets on a system map, use {console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm}.

You can press {console_bind|Confirm} to highlight abilities and consumables on the panel at the bottom of the screen or choices in dialogues and book events to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or objects on the map, use {console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm}.

You can press {console_bind|Confirm} to highlight abilities and consumables on the panel at the bottom of the screen or choices in dialogues and book events to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or objects on the map, use {console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm}.

You can press {console_bind|Confirm} to highlight abilities and consumables on the panel at the bottom of the screen or choices in dialogues and book events to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or objects on the map, use {console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm}.

languages.text: Нажатием {console_bind|Confirm} вы можете подсвечивать способности и расходные предметы на панели в нижней части экрана или выборы в диалогах и книжных событиях, чтобы показать остальным участникам группы, что вы хотите выбрать. Чтобы подсветить такие объекты, как клетки на поле боя, модели существ или объекты на карте, используйте {console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm}.
languages.original_text: You can press {console_bind|Confirm} to highlight abilities and consumables on the panel at the bottom of the screen or choices in dialogues and book events to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or objects on the map, use {console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text: Нажатием {console_bind|Confirm} вы можете подсвечивать строки в диалогах или книжных событиях или способности на панели способностей, чтобы показать остальным участникам группы, что вы хотите выбрать. Чтобы подсветить такие объекты, как клетки на поле боя, модели существ или планеты на карте системы, используйте {console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm}.

Нажатием {console_bind|Confirm} вы можете подсвечивать строки в диалогах или книжных событиях или способности на панели способностей, чтобы показать остальным участникам группы, что вы хотите выбрать. Чтобы подсветить такие объекты, как клетки на поле боя, модели существ или планеты на карте системы, используйте {console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm}.

languages.text: Puedes pulsar {console_bind|Confirm} para resaltar capacidades y consumibles en el panel de la zona inferior de la pantalla u opciones de diálogo y eventos de libro para indicar al resto del grupo qué opción prefieres. Para otros elementos, como las casillas del campo de batalla, modelos de criatura o elementos del mapa, pulsa {console_bind|LeftUp} + {console_bind|Confirm}.
languages.original_text: You can press {console_bind|Confirm} to highlight abilities and consumables on the panel at the bottom of the screen or choices in dialogues and book events to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or objects on the map, use {console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text: Puedes pulsar {console_bind|Confirm} para resaltar capacidades y consumibles en el panel de la zona inferior de la pantalla u opciones de diálogo y eventos de libro para indicar al resto del grupo qué opción prefieres. Para otros elementos, como las casillas del campo de batalla, modelos de criatura o elementos del mapa, pulsa {console_bind|LeftUp} + {console_bind|Confirm}.

languages.text: {console_bind|Confirm}を押すと、画面下部のパネルに表示されるアビリティや消耗品、またはダイアログや書物イベントの選択肢をハイライトして、他のグループメンバーに選びたい選択肢を示すことが可能です。戦場のセルやクリーチャーそのもの、マップ上にあるオブジェクトなどその他のオブジェクトは{console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm}でハイライトできます。
languages.original_text: You can press {console_bind|Confirm} to highlight abilities and consumables on the panel at the bottom of the screen or choices in dialogues and book events to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or objects on the map, use {console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text: {console_bind|Confirm}を押すと、画面下部のパネルに表示されるアビリティや消耗品、またはダイアログや書物イベントの選択肢をハイライトして、他のグループメンバーに選びたい選択肢を示すことが可能です。戦場のセルやクリーチャーそのもの、マップ上にあるオブジェクトなどその他のオブジェクトは{console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm}でハイライトできます。

languages.text: 您可以按下{console_bind|Confirm}，在屏幕底部的面板上高亮显示能力与消耗品，或是在对话与文本事件期间高亮标记文本行，让其他玩家看到您想要选择的选项。若要高亮显示其他物体，如战场上的格子、目标生物，或地图上的物品，请按下{console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm}进行选择。
languages.original_text: You can press {console_bind|Confirm} to highlight abilities and consumables on the panel at the bottom of the screen or choices in dialogues and book events to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or objects on the map, use {console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text: 您可以按下{console_bind|Confirm}，在屏幕底部的面板上高亮显示能力与消耗品，或是在对话与文本事件期间高亮标记文本行，让其他玩家看到您想要选择的选项。若要高亮显示其他物体，如战场上的格子、目标生物，或地图上的物品，请按下{console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm}进行选择。

languages.text: Drücke {console_bind|Confirm}, um Fähigkeiten und Verbrauchsgegenstände oder Entscheidungen in Dialogen oder Buchereignissen am unteren Bildschirmrand zu markieren, um anderen Gruppenmitgliedern zu zeigen, mit welcher Option du fortfahren möchtest. Mit {console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm} kannst du andere Objekte wie Zellen auf dem Schlachtfeld, Kreaturenmodelle oder Objekte auf der Karte markieren.
languages.original_text: You can press {console_bind|Confirm} to highlight abilities and consumables on the panel at the bottom of the screen or choices in dialogues and book events to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or objects on the map, use {console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text: Drücke {console_bind|Confirm}, um Fähigkeiten und Verbrauchsgegenstände oder Entscheidungen in Dialogen oder Buchereignissen am unteren Bildschirmrand zu markieren, um anderen Gruppenmitgliedern zu zeigen, mit welcher Option du fortfahren möchtest. Mit {console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm} kannst du andere Objekte wie Zellen auf dem Schlachtfeld, Kreaturenmodelle oder Objekte auf der Karte markieren.

languages.text: Appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm} pour mettre en évidence des capacités et consommables sur le panneau en bas de l'écran ou les choix dans les dialogues et les livres afin d'indiquer aux membres de votre groupe l'option que vous souhaitez choisir. Pour les autres éléments, comme les cases du champ de bataille, les modèles de créatures ou les objets sur la carte, utilisez {console_bind|LeftUp} + {console_bind|Confirm}.
languages.original_text: You can press {console_bind|Confirm} to highlight abilities and consumables on the panel at the bottom of the screen or choices in dialogues and book events to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or objects on the map, use {console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm}.

traits.locale_text: Appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm} pour mettre en évidence des capacités et consommables sur le panneau en bas de l'écran ou les choix dans les dialogues et les livres afin d'indiquer aux membres de votre groupe l'option que vous souhaitez choisir. Pour les autres éléments, comme les cases du champ de bataille, les modèles de créatures ou les objets sur la carte, utilisez {console_bind|LeftUp} + {console_bind|Confirm}.

Appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm} pour mettre en évidence des capacités et consommables sur le panneau en bas de l'écran ou les choix dans les dialogues et les livres afin d'indiquer aux membres de votre groupe l'option que vous souhaitez choisir. Pour les autres éléments, comme les cases du champ de bataille, les modèles de créatures ou les objets sur la carte, utilisez {console_bind|LeftUp} + {console_bind|Confirm}.

languages.text: Ekranın altında bulunan paneldeki kabiliyet ve sarf eşyaları vurgulu göstermek ya da diyalog ve kitap sekanslarında hangi seçeneği seçmek istediğini diğer grup üyelerine belirtmek için {console_bind|Confirm} düğmesine basabilirsin. Çatışma alanındaki hücreler, yaratık modelleri veya haritadaki nesneler gibi diğer nesneler için {console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm} düğmelerini kullan.
languages.original_text: You can press {console_bind|Confirm} to highlight abilities and consumables on the panel at the bottom of the screen or choices in dialogues and book events to show other group members which option you would like to choose. For other objects, such as cells on the battlefield, creature models, or objects on the map, use {console_bind|LeftUp}+{console_bind|Confirm}.
